name: European Pet Organization
goal: The European Pet Organization is the European organization with which national pet trade associations in Europe collaborate in order to strengthen their position on European and other international issues.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Customs, Enterprise, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
ACCESS AND BENEFIT SHARING (ABS)- the CBD Nagoya Protocol
ANIMAL FEEDS
ANIMAL FOOD AND FEEDS
ANIMAL HEALTH
ANIMAL SKINCARE PRODUCTS
ANIMAL TRADE
ANIMAL TRANSPORT
ANIMAL WELFARE
CITES
INVASIVE SPECIES
WILDLIFE MANAGEMENT
